Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your monk level.

If the damage is reduced to 0, you use a Discipline Point to Deflect the Attack.
You can only reduce damage from the attack - any additional effects can't be negated.
